title: Vote for the Fifth Round Golff Pools（第5轮Golff Farm矿池投票）
body:
Any user who holds GOF can participate in the Golff Farm candidate voting since 2 AM, 10/27/2020 to  2 AM 10/28/2020(UTC).   Uni-V2 (GOF-ETH), GDAI, GYCRV and the top 2 voted tokens in the community will enter the fifth round mining(2 weeks) of Golff Farm. Mining pool quota allocation: the community voted for the top 2 tokens and GToken tokens. The incentive for each mining pool is 20,000 per week, and the incentive for Uni-V2 (GOF-ETH) is 30,000 per week.

Golff第五轮流动性挖矿候选人投票已经正式开启，请所有持有GOF的社区用户为您所支持的候选项目进行投票。Uni-V2(GOF-ETH)、GDAI、GYCRV和社区投票票数排名前2的代币进入Golff Farm第五轮（2周）挖矿。矿池额度分配：社区票选前2名的代币和GToken代币每个矿池的激励为每周2万个，Uni-V2(GOF-ETH)的激励为每周3万个
author: 0xEdba3A794B15880659b4459E02350C1c73cE2375
